titleStmt.title: The master-piece of round-heads, or, An explanation and declaration of the right round-heads in deed and such as are and shall be the true round-heads by all consent and act of Parliament. / Written by a well-wisher to King, Parliament, religion and state.
titleStmt.author: Well-wisher to King, Parliament, religion and state.
